content:
TITLE: Adding a specific component with Motion Primitives CLI
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to add a specific animated component to a project using the Motion Primitives CLI. It uses the 'text-morph' component as an example.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/cli/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx motion-primitives add text-morph
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Component API Documentation in Markdown Table
DESCRIPTION: Presents the Transition Panel component's API documentation in a markdown table format, listing all available props with their types, defaults, and descriptions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/transition-panel/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Prop           | Type                                         | Default | Description                                                                      |
| :------------- | :------------------------------------------- | :------ | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| children       | React.ReactNode[]                            |         | The content that the panel will transition through.                              |
| className      | string                                       |         | Optional CSS class to apply to the panel container for additional styling.       |
| transition     | Transition                                   |         | The transition settings from motion to control the animation effects.            |
| activeIndex    | number                                       |         | The index of the currently active child element to display.                      |
| variants       | Object (with enter, center, exit properties) |         | Variants for each animation state (enter, center, exit) to customize animations. |
| ...motionProps | MotionProps                                  |         | Spread all additional motion props to the motion.div component.                  |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining AnimatedGroup Component API
DESCRIPTION: Describes the API for the AnimatedGroup component, including props, their types, default values, and descriptions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/animated-group/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Prop      | Type                                                      | Default   | Description                                          |
| :-------- | :-------------------------------------------------------- | :-------- | :--------------------------------------------------- |
| children  | ReactNode                                                 |           | The child elements to be animated.                   |
| className | string                                                    | undefined | Optional CSS class for styling the component.        |
| variants  | `{ container?: Variants; item?: Variants; }`              | undefined | Custom variants for container and item animations.   |
| preset    | 'fade' \| 'slide' \| 'scale' \| 'blur-sm' \| 'blur-slide' | undefined | Preset animations to apply to the group of elements. |
| as        | React.ElementType                                         | 'div'     | The HTML element to render the component as.         |
| asChild   | React.ElementType                                         | 'div'     | The HTML element to render the child elements as.    |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Scroll Progress Component API
DESCRIPTION: Provides a table detailing the props available for the ScrollProgress component, including their types, defaults, and descriptions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/scroll-progress/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Markdown
CODE:
```
| Prop          | Type          | Default | Description                                                |
| :------------ | :------------ | :------ | :--------------------------------------------------------- |
| className     | string        |         | Optional CSS class for styling the scroll progress.        |
| springOptions | SpringOptions |         | Optional spring options for the scroll progress animation. |
| containerRef  | RefObject     |         | Optional Ref object for the container element.             |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing available components with Motion Primitives CLI
DESCRIPTION: This command lists all available animated components that can be added to a project using the Motion Primitives CLI. It provides descriptions and dependency information for each component.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/cli/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx motion-primitives list
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Text Shimmer Component API in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Provides a table describing the props and their types for the TextShimmer component, including children, as, className, duration, and spread.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/text-shimmer/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Prop      | Type                        | Default   | Description                                    |
| :-------- | :-------------------------- | :-------- | :--------------------------------------------- |
| children  | string                      |           | The text content.                              |
| as        | keyof JSX.IntrinsicElements | 'p'       | The HTML tag to render, defaults to paragraph. |
| className | string                      | undefined | Optional CSS class for styling the component.  |
| duration  | number                      | 2         | The duration of the shimmer effect.            |
| spread    | number                      | 2         | The spread of the shimmer effect.              |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Motion Library via NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Motion animation library which is required for component animations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/installation/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install motion
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rendering Card with Transition Panel Example
DESCRIPTION: Displays a live demonstration of the TransitionPanelCard component with a code preview. The component is rendered in a container with minimal padding.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/transition-panel/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<ComponentCodePreview
  classNameComponentContainer='p-4'
  component={<TransitionPanelCard />}
  filePath='app/docs/transition-panel/transition-panel-card.tsx'
/>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Motion Primitives CLI globally with npm
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the Motion Primitives CLI globally using npm. After installation, the CLI can be used directly from the command line.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/cli/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g motion-primitives
motion-primitives <command>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Motion Primitives CLI with npx
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use the Motion Primitives CLI directly with npx without installing it globally. This method runs the CLI on-demand.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/cli/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx motion-primitives <command>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rendering Installation Instructions with Tabbed Interface
DESCRIPTION: Presents installation options for the Transition Panel component with a tabbed interface showing CLI and manual installation methods.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/transition-panel/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<Tabs defaultValue="cli">

<TabsList>
  <TabsTrigger value='cli'>CLI</TabsTrigger>
  <TabsTrigger value='manual'>Manual</TabsTrigger>
</TabsList>

<TabsContent value="cli">

<InstallationCli value='transition-panel' />

</TabsContent>

<TabsContent value="manual">

<Steps>

<Step>Copy and paste the following code into your project.</Step>

<CodeBlock filePath='components/core/transition-panel.tsx' />

<Step>Update the import paths to match your project setup.</Step>

</Steps>

</TabsContent>

</Tabs>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing In-View Component via CLI
DESCRIPTION: Shows the command to install the in-view component using the CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/in-view/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```

```

TITLE: Creating a New Branch in Git
DESCRIPTION: Command to create and switch to a new branch for development. Creating feature branches is a good practice to isolate changes before submitting pull requests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git checkout -b my-new-branch
```

DESCRIPTION: Import statements for the Magnetic component examples (basic and nested) and the component code preview utility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/app/docs/magnetic/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies with NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the motion-primitives project. This must be done before starting development to ensure all required packages are available.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Motion-Primitives Repository in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the motion-primitives repository to your local machine. This is the first step in the development workflow before making any contributions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Navigating to the Project Directory in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Command to change directory into the cloned motion-primitives project. This step follows repository cloning in the development workflow.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/motion-primitives/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd motion-primitives
```
